subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: In its latest postseason comeback, Los Angeles overcame a 2-0 deficit, dominating the Rangers over the last 25 minutes and winning Game 1 of the finals on Justin Williams’s overtime goal.
snippet: In its latest postseason comeback, Los Angeles overcame a 2-0 deficit, dominating the Rangers over the last 25 minutes and winning Game 1 of the finals on Justin Williams’s overtime goal.
